title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.4.4

Update via:

  • Add Features:
    • Set playback speed
    • Share YouTube link
    • Share local music file
  • Update: Load all YouTube playlist of your account instead of limited at 50 items.
  • Fix crash on startup (android 7.0)

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.4.1

  • Fix load Popular videos error
  • Fix play video via share intent not working sometime
  • Update some icons

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.4.0

  • Add Setting options: MP3 encoder and bitrate
  • Add remove songs feature (may not work with songs store in SD card)
  • Fix can't play songs have same name
  • Fix album art display wrong
  • Fix some login issues and app crash

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.3.12

  • Restore FLAC support
  • Update download file name format "Artist - Song name"
  • Auto scroll song name if it's too long
  • Fix login error
  • Fix display wrong album art
  • Fix can't play music when connect to monitored network (e.g using Proxy/VPN/company's wifi)

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.3.10

  • Fix MP3 convert error when video title contains single quote '
  • Add AAC audio, Full HD video download options
  • Add menu Play it only to prevent auto load related videos
  • Fix login error with message "PRECONDITION REQUIRED"
  • Fix can't change settings: Content location, Audio quality on mobile/wifi network

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.3.9

  • Optimize speed load video (3 times faster)
  • Optimize data consumed
  • Add settings to control "Audio Quality" when using Cellular network and Wifi.
  • Fix Mp3 download error on Android O
  • Fix error when play LIVE stream
  • Fix can't clear play history
  • Update DownloadManger: add menu to see mp3 convert history
  • Fix crash when browse album, and others random crash.

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.3.6

  • Introduce new MP3 converter plugin, download MP3 max speed and high quality.
  • Add "Queue next" function
  • Fix can't play some songs after download, because the file is broken.
  • Various bugs fix and improvements.

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.3.4

Dec 27, 2017

  • Add notification settings: disable vibration, sound, opt-out update notification,...
  • Improve loading speed and data caching: fix long loading recommended videos.
  • Fix Jockey artist's image and bio not display
  • Fix player problem: display wrong now playing, stop playing,...
  • Fix download problems: fix song downloaded not display in Jockey
  • Fix YMusic's tabs setting bug
  • Stability and performance improvement.

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.3.0

Dec 18, 2017

  • Add Shazam support: browse Shazam chart, artist's top tracks inside YMusic. Play music from Shazam App by clicking Share button.
  • Fix critical bugs in music player:
    • Fix music stop after screen off for a while
    • Fix music player crash when play next/previous
  • UI change:
    • RTL layout support: fix broken UI in RTL language.
    • Fix can't scroll playing queue in some device.
  • Add new section: Playlist for you - list of recommended video base on what you play.
  • Update YouTube Search:
    • Add artist's top track and albums in search result
    • Fix display previous search result when rotate screen
    • Add Artist's Mix videos in search result
  • Remove notification sound and vibration in Android O
  • Fix can't update new version in some devices
  • Fix crash on start up
  • Add more bugs to fix later
  • Stability and performance improvement

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.2.1

Dec 1, 2017

  • Faster get link speed
  • Improve gapless playback with adaptive stream technology
  • Add Remove Ad
  • Fix player doesn't play next song
  • Fix repeat mode not working
  • Fix play error in some specific video
  • Fix Equalizer crash
  • Minor UI change and other bug fix.

Dec 2, 2017

  • Fix crash in Android O
  • Fix stop playing suddenly
